subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Two of the N.H.L.’s Original Six, the Blackhawks and the Bruins, will meet for the first time in the Stanley Cup finals. The sporting fates of the two cities have not often been intertwined.
snippet: Two of the N.H.L.’s Original Six, the Blackhawks and the Bruins, will meet for the first time in the Stanley Cup finals. The sporting fates of the two cities have not often been intertwined.
